name: Weekend Extreme Adventure
description:
Feel the pressure on your feet as you walk through the trails provided for you to see and explore the beauty of nature. 

Nature affords an excellent venue to relieve stress and reconnect with yourself on a day to day basis. A weekends centered on nature tripping, exploring and enjoying the place.

It's a highly individualistic activity, great for people with passions like sightseeing, hiking, mountain climbing, camping, swimming and so on. However its also a great way for people who generally avoid extended time in nature to reconnect with themselves in the natural setting. Often the humbling experience of hiking up a mountain or the serenity of a tranquil forest afford the perfect setting to leave behind stress and regroup in an effective, healthy manner.

Tying memories to places through communing with nature creates rewarding, positive experiences that will work against the stress cycle.

Join me for a weekend of extreme activities. Let's go hiking, camping, cave exploration, swimming and more!
